appearances.title: Fox Report With Jon Scott : FOXNEWSW : January 3, 2026 12:00pm-1:00pm PST
appearances.snippet: jon: congressman cory mills, we appreciate your time. thank you. >> thank you so much.rld leaders are also reacting to the u.s. strike on venezuela. we're live at the united nations with more on that next. ♪ turn right. this is how you make crispy korean fried chicken. wifi speeds as fast as home, even when you're on the go. cut your mobile bill in half and save $65 a month for your first year with xfinity mobile. jon: the united states is one of more than 50 nations that have condemned venezuelan president nicolas maduro as a dictator. maybe we should call him ex-president. they've also refused to recognize him as the country's legitimate leader. so how is the world reacting to last night's strike on venezuela and maduro's arrest? c.b. cotton is live at the united nations with more on that. >> reporter: hey, jon. well, more on that global reaction in a moment. first i want to talk about what we're seeing and hearing at home, specifically new york. we expect the captured venezuelan leader, nicolas maduro, to arrive sometime this evening. now in his first public break wi
